text: Ricardo Fernandez Tio (born January 5, 1976 in Castellón) is a goalball athlete from Spain. He has a disability: he cannot see anything. He is a B1 type goalball player. He played goalball at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. His team was third. He played goalball at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. His team was third. == References == Category:Spanish goalball players Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B1 Category:People from the Valencian Community
title: Ricardo Fernández
